about.bio: I surround myself with people who are smarter than me to learn from them. I'm motivated and determined to always better myself, and I bring out the best in others because I know that brings out the best in me.

description.text: After finishing my undergraduate degree in 3.5 years, I will continue at Lehigh to complete and finish a graduate degree in Computer Science in one semester.

Lehigh's program in Computer Science and Business (CSB) is a joint initiative between the College of Business and Economics and the Department of Computer Science and Engineering in the P.C. Rossin College of Engineering and Applied Science. CSB students enroll—and are assigned faculty advisors—in both colleges. Students completing this demanding program are awarded a unique joint degree from both colleges. It equips students with the high-tech and business skills they need at a time when the boundaries between the two fields are becoming increasingly blurred.

High Technology High School is a pre-engineering career academy that emphasizes the interconnections among mathematics, science, technology and the humanities, prepares students to become proactive and creative problem solvers, effective communicators, and tomorrow's leaders through a rigorous, specialized curriculum and collaborative partnerships.

bullets: Developed in Angular 7 on the next generation of the PI Visualization software, working on UI, data processing, and testing areas
Worked in an Agile - Scrum environment, including running stand-ups for a team of 9 and presenting at project-wide sprint review meetings
Completed an average of 15 Kanban-style effort points per sprint, improving the team's average velocity metric by 17%
Evaluated different enterprise blockchain and distributed ledger technology solutions for internal and external use for PwC Czech Republic’s Assurance department
Developed a plugin using VBA and Hyperledger Composer for Microsoft Excel that allows for workbooks to export to and import from a distributed Hyperledger Fabric network
Developed localization script for global logistical reporting using Python’s XML ElementTree
Detected and analyzed coding bugs and algorithmic efficiency in pre-existing programs

catalog.title: HTML5
catalog.description: Like many other programmers, HTML was one of the first technologies I was exposed to. I find it as a phenomenal entry point for learning computer science, as it's a straightforward, visual representation of the power of computers - and serves as the underlying foundation for the internet.

awards.title: Piazza Tech Tour Finalist
bullets: Selected as one of 10 Finalists for the Piazza Summer 2019 Tech Tour
Piazza is an online educational technology platform that is utilized by 50,000 professors in 2,000 schools in more than 90 different countries

awards.title: Lehigh CSB PwC Scholar
bullets: Awarded as one of two students to receive a $2,000 scholarship towards study abroad expenses
Worked for PwC Czech Republic in Prague, Czechia, researching and developing a proof-of-concept Microsoft Excel blockchain plug-in

awards.title: Tau Beta Pi Initiate
bullets: Initiated as part of Lehigh University's Spring 2019 initiate class
Tau Beta Pi is the oldest engineering honor society in the United States

awards.title: Rossin Junior Fellow
bullets: Selected as one of two students by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering to represent the Class of 2021 in the RJF Honor Society
I help represent the P.C. Rossin College of Engineering & Applied Sciences to prospective students through admissions events and admitted student days

awards.title: Winner, Blockchain Design Prompt, Lehigh Valley Hacks
bullets: Prototyped an easy-to-use, fully functional virtual wallet device that allows transfer between ERC20 cryptocurrencies
Designed the User Interface to balance usability with data privacy via anonymous, but recognizable, user icons

awards.title: First Place, Wharton Undergraduate FinTech Hackathon
bullets: Prototyped a money-management solution aimed at consumers for easy-to-use peer-to-peer lending
Designed the User Interface to allow users for easy access to both peer users and their consumer bank
